detectors.description:
UNIxGemRewards.notifyRewardAmount(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UNIxGemRewards.sol#693-708) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-rewardRate = reward.div(DURATION) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UNIxGemRewards.sol#698)
	-leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UNIxGemRewards.sol#701)
detectors.markdown:
[UNIxGemRewards.notifyRewardAmount(uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UNIxGemRewards.sol#L693-L708) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-[rewardRate = reward.div(DURATION)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UNIxGemRewards.sol#L698)
	-[leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UNIxGemRewards.sol#L701)
